message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking of going a bit lower. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?

I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make a decent profit. How about $110 is still a bit too high for you, but $108 might be more reasonable?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $106?
I think we're really close now, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $106, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. How about we meet exactly in the middle at $107?
